resources.string: Oi… You are having a hard time there ain´t ya? Keep up, the world is still spinning and things will change soonish. No one needs to be happy all the time.
Good, but could be better.\nKeep up!

As I always say:
"Average Beverage" 

Makes no sense but at least it rhymes. You have as much bad days as good days and that´s OKAY! Nothing to worry about… Or maybe you are extremely emotional and have ups and downs like every other day.

 Anyways, good job!

Yay!! You are a happy child! 

"Nobody can drag you down!"
 - One Direction

(Harry is better on his own anyways, so nothing to worry about)

As the Aussies always say:
"Your problems are half a bees dick long."

Scientist translated this to:
"All is good."

Which means you is also good!
